backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no state or backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and dark-mode theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point rendering the root element and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app shell with header, background settings sheet, and tab-based timer mode switching.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/Backgr: UI for selecting backgrounds via upload, URL, or YouTube, with validation and error handling.
Renders image, video, or YouTube iframe backgrounds with autoplay handling and error display.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/mediaS: Helpers for inferring media type from MIME and generating fallback media error messages.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/useBac: Manages background media state including file, URL, and YouTube sources with localStorage persistence and error handling.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/youtub: Parses YouTube URLs to extract video IDs and builds autoplaying embed URLs for background playback.
frontend/src/features/timers/countdown/C: UI component rendering a countdown timer with controls and manual duration inputs.
frontend/src/features/timers/countdown/u: Hook providing countdown logic, persistence, start/pause/reset handling, and accurate interval ticking.
frontend/src/features/timers/interval/In: UI for an alternating interval timer showing progress, interval settings, and run controls.
frontend/src/features/timers/interval/us: Hook implementing interval A/B timing, round progression, persistence, and skip/start/pause logic.
frontend/src/features/timers/pomodoro/Po: UI for a Pomodoro timer with segment display, controls, and configurable durations.
frontend/src/features/timers/pomodoro/us: Custom hook managing Pomodoro state, timing, segment transitions, and persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/timers/repeating/R: UI component for a repeating countdown timer with controls, settings inputs, and display.
frontend/src/features/timers/repeating/u: Hook managing repeating timer logic, repeat counting, auto-restart behavior, and saved settings.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/time: Utility functions for formatting seconds and milliseconds into human‑readable time strings.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/useA: Custom interval hook ensuring consistent callback execution while running.
frontend/src/features/timers/stopwatch/S: Stopwatch UI component showing elapsed time, controls, and a scrollable lap list.
frontend/src/features/timers/stopwatch/u: Hook implementing stopwatch functionality with elapsed tracking, laps, and interval updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes, plus base styles and a numeric timer utility class.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and an Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme extensions, OKLCH color variables, animations, typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, features, architecture notes, and version metadata for a multi‑mode timer app with background customization.
